channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 12

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Good point. I thought about the throw in, but for some reason decided against it. I think the one extra liberty is definitely not worth whatever I was thinking, so definitely something I'll do next time I have the chance!
item.content:encoded: Good point. I thought about the throw in, but for some reason decided against it. I think the one extra liberty is definitely not worth whatever I was thinking, so definitely something I’ll do next time I have the chance!

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Move 62 - I think you should have thrown-in instead. Then after white takes you atari back and give him bad shape. The game move isn't bad but it gives white an extra liberty.
item.content:encoded: Move 62 – I think you should have thrown-in instead. Then after white takes you atari back and give him bad shape. The game move isn’t bad but it gives white an extra liberty.

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: Very interesting review! I learned something. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Very interesting review! I learned something. Thanks.
